sentences.sContent: What you’re hearing is the voice of complacence.
sentences.sContent_eng: What you’re hearing is the voice of complacence.
sentences.sCn: 你听到的是沾沾自喜的声音。

sentences.sContent: Satire jars us out of complacence into a pleasantly shocked realization that many of the values we unquestioningly accept are false.
sentences.sContent_eng: Satire jars us out of complacence into a pleasantly shocked realization that many of the values we unquestioningly accept are false.
sentences.sCn: 讽刺作品使我们排除了自满情绪，并愉快地惊叹道许多我们毫无疑问地接受的价值观是错误的。

remMethod.val: com(表加强) + plac(快乐的) + ence → 很快乐 → 自满
